features.name: 3D Facade Visualization
features.description: Interactive 3D viewer for architectural models using React Three Fiber.

features.name: Material Configuration
features.description: Real-time changing of facade materials and accent colors, fetching data from Supabase.

features.name: Augmented Reality (AR)
features.description: WebXR-based AR experience using <model-viewer> to place models in the real world.

features.name: Eco-Calculator Dashboard
features.description: Live calculation and visualization of environmental impact (CO2, Thermal) compared to baseline.

features.name: Telemetry Logging
features.description: Logging of user interactions (AR activation, material selection) to Supabase for validation logging.

features.name: Model Upload
features.description: Functionality to upload local .obj files for visualization.
